name: Starseeker Express
description:
Hey you there... Yes you... You most be our new conductor...  

Well let me be the first one to welcome you aboard the Starseeker Express  It is your job to keep this train going no matter what.. So don't let the fuel run out

 You can move around using the WASD keys and jump using the space key... 

With Right Mouse Button you can grab an Asteroid  even from a distance. Once you have an Asteroid you can throw it again using the Left Mouse Button, just remember to throw it into the boiler

  One last thing conductor, look out for those space anomalies! They will tear you apart if they get to close. You can shoot them down using the Left Mouse Button.  

Good luck out there conductor

Background soundtrack made by Philipp Klein
Special thanks to Magnus for sounds
